about_the_game:
Gather 'round the campfire, Survivors! Everyone has a story about the first Bob they encountered on an ARK… Now the legendary ARK veteran Bob -- voiced by Karl Urban -- is ready to share his own incredibly true adventures with you for the first time! Nothing can prepare you for the wonder, hijinks, and sheer two-fisted action of Bob's Tall Tales expansion pass!

Piece together Bob's larger-than-life ARK saga by recovering his animated Explorer Notes to unlock additional level-ups! You’ll feel like you were right there with Bob from the very beginning, as he describes his absolutely pivotal, undeniably central role in ARK’s history to young Meeka -- voiced by Auliʻi Cravalho.

Experience the thrilling wonder and awesome spectacle of Bob’s incredibly true adventures across 3 action-packed installments: Frontier Showdown, Steampunk Ascent, and Wasteland War!

Each Tall Tales installment delivers unique and helpful creatures, companions, missions, and vehicles like the monolithic Oasisaur & Trains on Scorched Earth, the wondrous Cosmo, ever helpful SIR-5rM8 (voiced by Alan Tudyk) and Zeppelins on Aberration, the loyal Armadoggo and BattleRigs on Extinction!

Gear-up for 'Wasteland War' on ARK Extinction, the thrilling conclusion of Bob’s Tall Tales! Drive through the desolate wastes in highly-customizable cars called 'BattleRigs—with over 10,000 possible variations—and blaze your own high-octane trail of destruction. Build an epic wasteland stronghold with new structures to defend your tribe's legacy against all challengers. Equip yourself with explosive spears and fire-quenching grenades to dominate the battlefield. Tame the loyal Armadoggo, a unique permanent companion you can outfit with powerful armor attachments to unlock incredible new abilities. So fuel-up, kick the tires, and forge your destiny as the ruler of this post-apocalyptic world!

Armadoggo - Forge an unbreakable bond with your ultimate survival companion! More than just a pet, Armadoggo digs for treasure, fetches items, and protects you from harm, with powerful armor attachments to further enhance their abilities.

BattleRigs - Your key to Wasteland conquest! Customize these powerful, highly modular, all-terrain war machines with a variety of attachments and heavy-duty turrets, then blaze your own trail of destruction. Over 10,000 possible variations!

Explosive Spear - Stick it to your enemies! This devastating weapon combines brutal melee combat with explosive power, detonating for maximum carnage.

Extinguisher Grenade - Douse the flames of combat and snuff out your enemy’s ambition! This unique grenade releases a cloud of fire-suppressing gas, instantly extinguishing fires to give you the upper hand.

Bladewasp Hive - Keep the skies clear! This organic turret unleashes defensive swarms to defend your base, deterring pesky creatures and bringing down even the mightiest flyers.

Bio-Grinder - Maximize your dino gains! This massive structure extracts every last resource from organic fodder, biodegrading it into valuable kibble and raw materials.

Lights & Lamps - Light up the night! Survive in style with a range of rugged, flame-powered lights and fires for your Wasteland base.

Makeshift Megalab - The pinnacle of scientific achievement! Unlock the secrets of advanced crafting in this state-of-the-art laboratory.

Tribe Tower - Forge a legendary legacy! Unite your tribe, construct this awe-inspiring monument, and defend it to secure your place among the ARK elite.

BattleRig Garage - Gear up and roll out! This fortified garage is your command center for building, customizing, and unleashing your BattleRigs on the Wasteland.

Wasteland Skins - Give your structures a gritty, post-apocalyptic makeover with these rugged new skin including a table, chair, and bench.

Wasteland Structure Tileset Skins -- Transform your base! A post-apocalyptic structure tileset including various pieces like ceilings, doors, walls, floors, and more.

WarPig Outfit Set - Includes Hat, Shirt, Pants, Gloves and Boots

Warlord Outfit Set - Includes Hat, Shirt, Pants, Gloves and Boots

Crocosaurus Hat

Motorhead Hat

BucketFace Hat

Strap on your goggles and gear up for an incomparable journey to the dark heart of Aberration! Brave this lethal underworld with a trusty clockwork-robot companion by your side! Defy the subterranean depths by airship, or swing from luminous spider-silk with the new 'Cosmo' tame! Gum up adversaries with viscid projectiles, and evade attack with a wondrous watch that allows you to slip backwards to safety! Learn to identify, extract, and transfer useful DNA-traits between creatures! Harness the forces of nature and hurl the gauntlet of super-science into the frightful face of death itself!

Cosmo - A web-slinging shoulder pet known for getting survivors out of tight spot with its threat-sense, organic grappling, web-slinging and shooting abilities

SIR-5rM8 - A trusty robot voiced by Alan Tudyk who can automate various chores such as: organizing items, repairing structures, and harvesting resources

Zeppelin - A large dirigible with a platform to create mobile airbases

Gene Scanner - A utility item for players with multiple functions, including detecting specific creatures, interacting with the Gene Infusion system, extracting traits, applying infusions to baby creatures, and harvesting embryos from pregnant creatures

Goo Gun - Fires incapacitating and bouncy blobs of organic goo

Stopwatch - A handheld time-traveling teleportation device

Clock - A large clock that speeds up crafting for nearby structures

Embryo Incubator - An incubator specifically for Embryos, with Gene Scanner compatibility for extracting Embryos from non-Egg-laying creatures

Gene Storage - A structure for storing and applying Traits to Tames, allowing players to enhance their creatures with up to five abilities collected from wild creatures

Industrial Preserving Bin - A larger, gasoline-powered upgrade to the Preserving Bin designed for Fabricator-level efficiency

Library Storage - A storage structure for Blueprints and Notes, allowing all allied inventories within a certain radius to access and use stored Blueprints

Lights & Lamps - A series of electric-powered, omnidirectional Victorian-style lights for various placements, including a tabletop plasma ball lamp for added aesthetic flair

Linked Storage Box - A Storage Box that shares its inventory with other Linked Storage Boxes

Steam Forge - A Tek-level Forge that runs on Element

Spotlight - A highly adjustable spotlight with a paintable front surface for custom designs, allowing players to create personalized signals and aim it in any direction

Tesla Coil - A defensive structure that shoots arcing electricity, chaining shots to nearby enemies, with multiple arc type settings

Tinkering Desk - A structure for combining existing Item-Blueprints for a chance to create higher-quality versions or downgrade them

Steampunk Structure Tileset Skins - A steampunk-themed cosmetic skin set for furniture structures, including a table, chair, and bench

Steampunk Structure Skins - A steampunk-themed structure tileset including various pieces like ceilings, doors, walls, floors, and more, each designed with a steampunk aesthetic

Dapper Outfit Set - Includes Hat, Shirt, Pants, Gloves and Boots

Engineer Outfit Set - Includes Hat, Shirt, Pants, Gloves and Boots

Beret Hat Skin

Boater Hat Skin

Cyclist Hat Skin

Steampunk Hat and Goggles Skin

Steampunk Goggles Skin

Rock Drake Steampunk Saddle Skin - A steampunk-themed saddle skin for the Rock Drake featuring goggles, functions as a regular saddle

On Club ARK, Bob's Tall Tales players get a daring exclusive mission in which they must break out of a fortified prison complex with Cosmo, their trusty spider companion, and flee from a colossal killer robot by commandeering a zeppelin in a thrilling aerial showdown.

Saddle up and stake your claim on the Scorched Earth! Build new Western-style structures like your own rootin' tootin' saloon, then tickle the ivories on your own piano for an authentic frontier experience. Hunt for buried treasure with your trusty shovel, tame hardy new creatures to pull your configurable wagon, and even hop aboard your own chugging steam train to explore those harsh badlands!

Oasisaur - A floating oasis and pacifist, it is a focused nexus of the Earth's “spirit.” Perfect for mobile bases, growing crops, and used to resurrect fallen friends!

Carts - A platform-saddle-like attachment for creatures

Trains - A system for transporting players, allies, creatures, and more across ARK

Train Tracks - Snaps together seamlessly, providing foundation support for trains!

Train Car - Travels along train tracks with speed changes and weather resistance

Engine Car - Controls the movement of all attached train cars

Platform Car - A platform that players can build on, acting like a platform saddle

Shovel - Allows players to bury items, dig up plants, and find hidden treasure!

Windmill - Generates power and assists nearby generators

Barrel Storage - A storage chest that can be sealed to delay decay of perishables

Water Reservoir - A large cylindrical barrel for storing water

Town Bell - A loud bell that is useful for informing your tribe of incoming raiders!

Saloon Piano - An upright piano that lets you play songs

Plant Pot - Great for placing indoor greenery in various sizes

Treasure Chest - Fancy-looking storage box that can be buried with a shovel to hide your treasure

Target Practice Bottles - Glass bottles that disappear when damaged before reappearing

Drawing Paper - Simple sheet of paper. Perfect for drawing on

Jailhouse Doors - Barred door variant that allows for visibility while stopping objects

Jailhouse Windows - Barred window variant that allows for visibility while stopping objects

Gas Street Lamp - Tall light source, placeable on the ground

Hanging Sign - Paintable sign that hangs on other structures

Gas Lamp - Small light source, placeable on the ground or any flat surface

Chandelier - Hanging light source

Coffin - Stackable coffin that acts like a bed with players sleeping like a vampire!

Swivel Stool - Simple seated tool that allows players to swivel 360°

Structure Skins - A frontier-themed cosmetic skin set for furniture structures including a table, chair, and stool

Frontier Structure Tileset - A structure tileset each designed with a Wild West aesthetic including various pieces like ceilings, doors, walls, floors and more

Player Character Armor Skins - New armor skin sets (Outlaw and Drifter Outfit Sets) along with a variety of assorted headwear like rancher hats

Dynamite Weapon Skin - A C4 can look like a frontier-themed pack of dynamite!

On Club ARK, Bob's Tall Tales players get a thrilling exclusive mission in which they'll race-down a runaway train on their trusty steeds, board it and clear out the bandits, and defend the moving train from an enemy assault as they make their way to freedom.

movies.name: ARK: Bob's Tall Tales Wasteland War Trailer
ARK: Bob's Tall Tales Steampunk Ascent Trailer
ARK: Bob's Tall Tales Frontier Showdown Trailer

name: ARK: Bob's Tall Tales

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
Blood
Use of Alcohol
Crude Humor

short_description: Get ready for Wild West trains, steampunk airships, post-apocalyptic battle-cars and more in Bob's Tall Tales! Discover new story adventure content, new creatures, structures, items, and cosmetics across the ARKs – all brought to life by big-hero Bob (Karl Urban) and Meeka (Auliʻi Cravalho)!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
